cont.entity_a: Strong as any light duty steel cart. Rigid and similar in strength to steel carts, with some frame flex on uneven surfaces. Lightweight and easier to steer compared to drywall carts. Lightweight yet sturdy, with a strong polymer frame. Good balance between sturdiness and weight.
cont.entity_b: Not sturdy enough for loads close to its 150 lbs rating. Fragile base and wheels make it unsteady with heavier loads.

cont.entity_a: Moves machinery down stairs without issue. Rolls well on grass and gravel. Easy conversion to a 4-wheel platform cart. Efficient for moving heavy objects, saving time and effort. Convertible feature makes it versatile for moving items.
cont.entity_b: Smooth-rolling wheels. Folds compactly for easy storage and transport. Compact and fits in overhead compartments on planes. Folds flat for easy storage in cars. Portable and ideal for small, lightweight tasks.

cont.entity_a: Strong industrial smell from rubber wheels. Lightweight polymer frame is strong but has a strong smell. Plastic smell decreases over time with exposure to air.
Does not rust like steel trucks. Recalls due to bad plastic rims; wheels need replacement. Tires tend to dry rot and lose air pressure over time.
cont.entity_b: Wheels and handle do not operate smoothly over time. Handle tends to bend under heavy loads. Wheels may require additional push on uneven surfaces.

cont.entity_a: Smooth bearings and pneumatic tires enhance performance. Large second set of wheels aids in hauling heavy items over thresholds. Sturdy with durable tires, but requires regular refilling.
cont.entity_b: Handle is too short, causing discomfort when pulling. Requires bungee cords to secure loads. Not suitable for stairs or uneven surfaces.
Convenient for light duty and everyday use. Affordable and compact but not suitable for heavy-duty tasks.

cont.entity_a: Difficult to convert from vertical to horizontal configuration. Difficult to use stair climbers for very heavy items.
cont.entity_b: Useful for transporting light items like groceries or boxes.

cont.entity_a: Some hardware missing on caster assembly upon arrival.
The blade could be deeper for better leverage.
cont.entity_b: Load plate deeper than most full-size dollies.
Platform could be larger for more stability.
